column5: My son has turned 18 and needs an Ontario fishing license, I mistakenly thought I could buy one on line. He is a Canadian citizen and Ontario resident, can I buy one at a local tackle shop for him?  I checked on line but couldn't find an answer.  thanks Dan
Sure you can, but only a 1 year. If you want to buy him a 3 year you need to go to a Service Ontario outlet. I did the same for my son a few years back when he turned 18.
Thanks, will stop by Grimsby Tackle after work for one.  Dan
your son has to be with you to get it.  I tried to get one for my wife last year at a CTC store and they wouldn't let me.
That's cuz Crappy Tire are tight asses.
Thanks for the heads up GBW.  Dan
